From: Ray Ormond (b)(6); @bop.gov Date: 7/23/19 11:46 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Lamine N'Diay (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov Subject: Re: Epstein >>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will nee ---------- Original message ---------

Date: 7/23,
